events.text:
[color=#ffed29]("I, Asato Akechi, on behalf of the Holy and Sovereign Church of Ventreville refuse any further dealings with the Avidine Factory...")
[color=#ffed29]("Cessation of support from the church to the Avidine Factory is effective immediately.")

[color=#ffed29](Yeah...why the church was ever involved with us seems very weird.)
[color=#ffed29](Definitely conflict of interest and all that.)
[color=#ffed29](This Mother Akechi guy definitely isn't playing around.)
